General.Name: Hansae Co
General.Description: Hansae Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells finished clothing products in Vietnam, Indonesia, Nicaragua, Guatemala, Myanmar, and Haiti. It also exports its products to the United States and other countries. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea, As on May 2, 2023 Hansae Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Hansae Yes24 Holdings Co., Ltd.
